item.title: Things got me confused about Event Sourcing
item.description: Many years ago, I implemented a system based on the concept of Event Sourcing. Years later, I realised my understanding of Event Sourcing had been wrong this whole time. This article talks about everything got me confused about Event Sourcing. State vs Event The very first thing I was confused is the definition of Event Sourcing. Here are some great definitions: Martin Fowler, 2005: “Event Sourcing ensures that all changes to application state are stored as a sequence of events.
